name: Baladins | Demo
description:
Baladins is an online multiplayer (1 to 4) narrative game inspired by RPGs and tabletop games. It is easy to pick-up, excellent with friends and it carries the feels of a whole campaign,  packed through 1-hour sessions. Replaying allows you to unlock new story lines, places and characters on your way!

Gather your team, choose your characters and launch yourself on an epic adventure in the world of Gatherac. You play as a troupe of itinerant artists, caught up in the gargantuan task of entertaining a dragon. But each time you fail, the beast sends your heroes back in time, again and again!

Your quest: explore the world, organize the feast, face the dragon and break the time loop!




BALADINS

Buskers, party animals, troublemakers... People gave them many names, but they call themselves Baladins! They travel from one town to another to fulfill their noble quest: entertainement!

A hard task with many faces. They can sing, dance, cook and throw a party. One day they help the community, and the other they create chaos! They can be glorious, they can be annoying, and they are always unexepected!

Their name is as old as the land itself and their origin long-forgotten. Their deeds are told in the folktales, to amuse or to inspire. Their legend precedes them and give hope and joy to the people.

~

PICK A CHAMP

Choose between four original heroes! Each busker has a unique skill, from cooking to fireworks, dance or luxomancy (the ancient magic of being very very good at fixing lamps). Don't judge a book by its cover, and check characteristics and classes while picking your champ!

~

EXPLORE THE WORLD

Travel the strange lands of Gatherac and unravel all its secrets and legends. Everybody knows a good myth is based on some truth, and myths may be a lot closer than you think. The turn-based exploration allows every player to feel the thrill of unveiling new places along the way!

~

CHOOSE YOUR OWN PATH: ONE STORY, MANY ADVENTURES

Every decision taken can affect the world around, and you're the one in charge! Tailor your adventure as you go but be ready to face the consequences. The decisions you have to make are not moral choices, but creative approaches that will have very different outcomes!

TRY THE DEMO!
